description: Try our easy to follow Char Siu Pork & Walnut Stir-Fry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stir-fry,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Pork,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Char Siu Pork & Walnut Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 440g thin egg noodles, cooked according to packet instructions (or steamed rice, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a wok over a high heat. Add 1 teaspoon oil and swirl around wok.
Cook pork strips in batches for 1-2 minutes or until golden, adding a little more if necessary. Transfer to a large plate.
Add green shallots, beans and snow peas to wok and stir fry for 1 minute. Add 1 tablespoon water and cover. Cook for 1 minute.
Add char siu sauce, 2 tablespoons of water, walnuts with pork. Toss until well combined and heated through. Spoon noodles onto serving plates. Top with stir-fry and serve immediately.
